title: BRIEF-Keppel Philippines Properties Says Unit & Opon-KE To Sell Their Stakes In Buena Homes (Sandoval)
text:
BRIEF-Keppel Philippines Properties Says Unit & Opon-KE To Sell Their Stakes In Buena Homes (Sandoval)

Stock Markets 52 minutes ago (Oct 14, 2019 09:20)

BRIEF-Keppel Philippines Properties Says Unit & Opon-KE To Sell Their Stakes In Buena Homes (Sandoval) Oct 14 (Reuters) - Keppel Philippines Properties Inc

:

* UNIT & OPON-KE PROPERTIES TO SELL THEIR STAKES IN BUENA

HOMES

(SANDOVAL) INC TO JETSON REALTY & DEV CORP

* TOTAL CONSIDERATION OF BOTH AGREEMENTS 44.8 MILLION PESOS



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSXbv6XDM

Further company coverage: KEP.PS



(Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
